CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Qwerty@321';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [ADLSCredential]
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity';


SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources;
SELECT * FROM sys.database_scoped_credentials;



IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://youtube-data-analysis@adlsgen2youtube.dfs.core.windows.net',
		CREDENTIAL = [ADLSCredential]
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[region_mst] (
	[region_code] varchar(5),
	[country_name] varchar(100),
	[continent] varchar(100)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'analytical-data/region_mst/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT  * FROM [dbo].[region_mst]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[statisticsData] (
	[title] nvarchar(4000),
	[channel_title] nvarchar(4000),
	[views] int,
	[likes] int,
	[dislikes] int,
	[comment_count] int,
	[comments_disabled] nvarchar(4000),
	[ratings_disabled] nvarchar(4000),
	[video_error_or_removed] nvarchar(4000),
	[publish_time] datetime2(7),
	[publish_date] date,
	[trending_date] date,
	[published_time] int,
	[time_period] nvarchar(4000),
	[publish_week_of_month] int,
	[trend_week_of_month] int,
	[trending_IN] int,
	[tags] nvarchar(4000),
	[description] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'analytical-data/statisticsData/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT  count(1) FROM [dbo].[statisticsData]
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[statisticsReferenceData] 
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[statisticsReferenceData] (
	[id] int,
	[title] nvarchar(4000),
	[category] nvarchar(4000),
	[Platform] nvarchar(4000)

	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'analytical-data/statisticsReferenceData/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[statisticsReferenceData]
GO

CREATE VIEW  [dbo].[statisticsReferenceData]
AS
SELECT
   *, result.filepath(1) as countryCode
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'analytical-data/statisticsReferenceData/countryCode=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT * FROM statisticsReferenceData



CREATE VIEW  [dbo].[statisticsData]
AS
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as region,result.filepath(2) as category_id,[title]
,[channel_title]
,[views]
,[likes]
,[dislikes]
,[comment_count]
,[comments_disabled]
,[ratings_disabled]
,[video_error_or_removed]
,[publish_time]
,[publish_date]
,[trending_date]
,[published_time]
,[time_period]
,[publish_week_of_month]
,[trend_week_of_month]
,[trending_IN]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'analytical-data/statisticsData/region=*/category_id=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'youtube-data-analysis_adlsgen2youtube_dfs_core_windows_net',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

    SELECT * FROM statisticsData
